title: Decisions by guardian
context: ยง327E-6 Decisions by guardian. (a) A guardian shall comply with the ward&rsquo;s individual instructions and shall not revoke the ward&rsquo;s pre-incapacity advance health-care directive unless expressly authorized by a court. (b) Absent a court order to the contrary, a health-care decision of a guardian appointed pursuant to chapter 560 takes precedence over that of an agent. &copy; A health-care decision made by a guardian for the ward is effective without judicial approval.
